EleNewEnergiesProducer » python

elenewenergiesproducer_cfi.py

00001 ## 
00002 #This module is a producer of ValueMaps that associate to each electron
00003 #in the GsfElectron collection, one float that is a new type of energy
00004 #associated to the electron. 
00005 #The core of the module is the plugin EleNewEnergiesProducer.cc whose
00006 #cfi.py file is elenewenergiesproducer_cfi.py
00007 #
00008 #The plugin just create the new collection, loop over the gsfElectron
00009 #collection and calculate the new energy according to a separate class
00010 #that should called by the plugin. The implementation of the
00011 #calculation of the new energy should not be done in the plugin but in
00012 #a separate class in order to keep it more general and flexible.
00013 #The separate class can be added in the src directory or already
00014 #present in some other CMSSW package (add the required lines in the
00015 #BuildFile.xml).
00016 #
00017 #
00018 #You should copy the files indicated in data/copy.url in the data/ directory
00019 ##
00020 import FWCore.ParameterSet.Config as cms
00021 
00022 # ALCARECO collections
00023 eleNewEnergiesProducer = cms.EDProducer('EleNewEnergiesProducer',
00024                                         electronCollection = cms.InputTag('gsfElectrons'),
00025                                         recHitCollectionEB = cms.InputTag("alCaIsolatedElectrons", "alcaBarrelHits"),
00026                                         recHitCollectionEE = cms.InputTag("alCaIsolatedElectrons", "alcaEndcapHits"),
00027                                         rhoFastJet = cms.InputTag('kt6PFJetsForRhoCorrection',"rho"),
00028                                         vertexCollection = cms.InputTag('offlinePrimaryVerticesWithBS'),
00029                                         BeamSpotCollection = cms.InputTag('offlineBeamSpot'),
00030                                         conversionCollection = cms.InputTag('allConversions'),
00031                                         isMC = cms.bool(False),
00032                                         regrPhoFile = cms.string('./data/gbrv3ph_52x.root'),
00033                                         regrEleFile = cms.string('./data/gbrv3ele_52x.root'),
00034                                         regrEleFile_fra = cms.string('nocorrection.root'),
00035                                         correctionFileName = cms.string(''),
00036                                         correctionType = cms.string(''),
00037                                         ptSplit = cms.bool(True),
00038                                         regrEleJoshV4_SemiParamFile = cms.string('src/HiggsAnalysis/GBRLikelihoodEGTools/data/regweights_v4_forest_ele.root'),
00039                                         regrPhoJoshV4_SemiParamFile = cms.string('src/HiggsAnalysis/GBRLikelihoodEGTools/data/regweights_v4_forest_ph.root'),
00040                                         regrEleJoshV5_SemiParamFile = cms.string('src/HiggsAnalysis/GBRLikelihoodEGTools/data/regweights_v5_forest_ele.root'),
00041                                         regrPhoJoshV5_SemiParamFile = cms.string('src/HiggsAnalysis/GBRLikelihoodEGTools/data/regweights_v5_forest_ph.root'),
00042                                         regrEleJoshV6_SemiParamFile = cms.string('src/HiggsAnalysis/GBRLikelihoodEGTools/data/regweights_v6_8TeV_forest_ele.root'),
00043                                         regrPhoJoshV6_SemiParamFile = cms.string('src/HiggsAnalysis/GBRLikelihoodEGTools/data/regweights_v6_8TeV_forest_ph.root'),
00044                                         regrEleJoshV7_SemiParamFile = cms.string('src/HiggsAnalysis/GBRLikelihoodEGTools/data/regweights_v7_8TeV_forest_ele.root'),
00045                                         regrPhoJoshV7_SemiParamFile = cms.string('src/HiggsAnalysis/GBRLikelihoodEGTools/data/regweights_v7_8TeV_forest_ph.root'),
00046                                         regrEleJoshV8_SemiParamFile = cms.string('src/HiggsAnalysis/GBRLikelihoodEGTools/data/regweights_v8_8TeV_forest_ele.root'),
00047                                         regrPhoJoshV8_SemiParamFile = cms.string('src/HiggsAnalysis/GBRLikelihoodEGTools/data/regweights_v8_8TeV_forest_ph.root'),
00048                                         regrEleJoshV6_SemiParam7TeVtrainFile = cms.string('src/HiggsAnalysis/GBRLikelihoodEGTools/data/regweights_v6_7TeV_forest_ele.root'),
00049                                         regrPhoJoshV6_SemiParam7TeVtrainFile = cms.string('src/HiggsAnalysis/GBRLikelihoodEGTools/data/regweights_v6_7TeV_forest_ph.root'),
00050                                         regrEleJoshV7_SemiParam7TeVtrainFile = cms.string('src/HiggsAnalysis/GBRLikelihoodEGTools/data/regweights_v7_7TeV_forest_ele.root'),
